triples.subject: Actor
triples.context: Actor需要StaticMesh属性来正确显示

triples.subject: Actor
triples.context: Actor需要StaticMeshComponent组件来正确显示

triples.subject: Actor
triples.context: Actor的Physics属性影响其物理行为

triples.subject: Actor
triples.context: Actor的bStatic属性影响其是否移动

triples.subject: Actor
triples.context: Actor的DrawScale属性影响其显示大小

triples.subject: Actor
triples.context: Actor的DrawScale3D属性影响其显示大小

triples.subject: Actor
triples.context: Actor的bUseBooleanEnvironmentShadowing属性影响其阴影性能

triples.context: Actor的BoundsScale属性影响其性能

triples.context: Actor的Collision Enabled属性影响其碰撞行为

triples.context: BSP笔刷可能需要Clean BSP Materials操作来清除无用材质引用
